articles.author: Brittany Caldwell
articles.title: Gov. DeSantis signs ‘Victoria’s Law’ for drug awareness & prevention
articles.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis signed a bill into law on Monday that focuses on the opioid crisis.

(marketscreener.com) 
 Zaandam, the Netherlands, April 9, 2024 - Ahold Delhaize has repurchased 287,944 of its common shares in the period from April 2, 2024 up to and including April 5, 2024. The shares were repurchased at an average price of € 27.82 per sha…
